perturbation.original_text: Products" shall mean casual apparel consisting of men's                   pants, shirts, sweaters, windshirts and raingear.
perturbation.changed_text: "Products" shall mean casual apparel consisting of men's pants, shirts, sweaters, windshirts, raingear, and specifically excludes any item bearing a logo other than Mossimo.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Products' is broad. The modified definition adds a restriction, potentially conflicting with later sections that might imply usage of products with other logos, creating ambiguity in the scope of the endorsement.

perturbation.original_text: Licensor agrees that Duval must achieve and maintain Exempt                   Status on the PGA Tour throughout each Contract Year and must                   participate as a player in a minimum of fifteen (15) official                   PGA Tour events each Contract Year (Minimum Annual Performance                   Requirements).
perturbation.changed_text: Licensor agrees that Duval must participate as a player in a minimum of fifteen (15) official                   PGA Tour events each Contract Year (Minimum Annual Performance                   Requirements). Exempt Status is preferred but not required.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the 'Exempt Status' requirement from a 'must' to a 'preferred but not required' status. This directly contradicts the original stringent requirement and creates uncertainty on the conditions for Additional License Fee.

perturbation.original_text: Company agrees that it will be responsible for, and the cost of, affixing the Company Logo on all such Outerwear.
perturbation.changed_text: Company agrees that it will be responsible for the initial cost of affixing the Company Logo on all such Outerwear; however, Licensor is responsible for all maintenance and replacement costs associated with the Company Logo on such outerwear.
perturbation.explanation: The original text makes the company responsible for all costs related to affixing the logo. The modified text introduces a split in responsibility, with Licensor handling maintenance and replacement. This creates a conflict regarding financial obligations.
